title: Business Feature: The implementation manager can enrich the required information which are needed for Hardware/License Ordering, RCS/Combridge logistics, DTA order
description:
Description
The Business Feature: The implementation manager can enrich the required information which are needed for Hardware/License Ordering, RCS/Combridge logistics, DTA order consisting of the Epics/Enablers:
